Business description: Oando PLC

Oando Plc is an oil and gas group organized around 2 areas of activity:

- crude and refined oil trading (78.6% of net sales);

- exploration and production of oil and gas (21.4%).

79.6% of net sales are abroad.

Number of employees: 154
